summary:
*yips softly and wags tail* 🐺😊 Oooh, dreamy times with Shadow! 👫 We chased clouds ☁️🏃‍🐺 *paws at the ground excitedly!* 🎉

*trembles and looks around nervously* 🌿💀 Oh noooo, dark woods! 😭 I don't know what's happening...
dream:
*snuggles up to a moonbeam* 🌕😴 Zzz...
*jumps awake, whimpering* 👻💔 Oooh, scary woods! 😨
*paws at the ground, trying to run away from an invisible shadow* 🏃‍🐺😂
goal:
*huddles closer to the moon's glow, trembling with uncertainty* 🌕😭 *whimpers softly* 👻💔
*shivers and cowers at an unseen threat, ears perked up in fright* 🏃‍🐺😂 *paws nervously* 💀
*wails a sorrowful woooaaa...* 🐺😢 *tails between legs, I don't know what's happening... 😭
